description.narrative: The overall objective has been defined as Vietnam becoming an industrialized middle-income country by 2020 with a knowledge economy and a National Innovation Systems (NIS) that actively supports socio-economic development. Adopting a wide view on innovatio n the partners have created a systemic approach to managing the task in hand to address the project purpose of strengthening the National Innovation System of Vietnam in capacity capability and through public-private partnerships (PPPs) that enable improve d NIS contribution to the socio-economic development of Vietnam.To achieve the project purpose four key results have been identified: i) The institutional environment is built up, ii) The S+T Management capacity and capability is strengthened, iii) Public and Private Partnerships are enabled nationally and internationally, and finally iv) Vietnamese-Finnish Public and Private Partnerships are facilitated as a pilot initiative to be expanded to further partnerships.
